scripts.serve: npm run environmentDev && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.serveProd: npm run environmentProd && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.deployDev: npm run environmentDev && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deployProd: npm run environmentProd && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.environmentDev: cd .. && firebase use dev && cd "functions" && firebase functions:config:set environment.mode=development && firebase functions:config:get > config.json && firebase functions:config:get
scripts.environmentProd: cd .. && firebase use prod && cd "functions" && firebase functions:config:set environment.mode=production && firebase functions:config:get > config.json && firebase functions:config:get
